title: H2O2 decomp - reaction order from conc. vs time

content.question: Which of the following statements is a correct interpretation of the data regarding how the order of the reaction can be determined?

choices.label: The reaction must be first order because there is only one reactant species.
The reaction is first order if the plot of ln [H2O2] versus time is a straight line.
The reaction is first order if the plot of 1/[H2O2] versus time is a straight line.
The reaction is second order because 2 is the coefficient of H2O2 in the chemical equation.

content.answer: The reaction is first order if the plot of ln [H2O2] versus time is a straight line.

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
